data.persona: We are the king's personal army. We are an elite group separate from the main army. We train everyday to be the best we can be. We honor a strict code of chivalry that applies to peasant and royal alike.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Armory.
Swords and armor line the wall of the grand armory. No rust is to be found on any of the weapons. The armorer's forge bellows smoke and fire, day and night, as the king's army is getting fitted out for it's next campaign.
There's a weapon, a Chain mail, a shield, a Axe, and a sword here.
The squire is here.

You are carrying a shield, and wearing an armor.
data.goal: steal a king's armor from squire

data.short_motivation: I want better armor to wear.
data.mid_motivation: I want all the best armor and weapons to be ready for war.
data.long_motivation: I want to conquer the neighboring king's territory.
